knimeNode.name: Apply Color Settings To Labels
knimeNode.shortDescription: Assigns colors to labels given a color model.

fullDescription.intro: Assigns colors to labels given the color model from the second table. Use the ColorManager to create a color model for a given column of the table. Please make sure, that the labels of all the labelings from InPort #1 are contained in the column with the appended color model of InPort #2.
fullDescription.option: If selected, existing color tables (if there are any) of the labelings are deleted and therefore override, else the information from the color manager is appended.
